ecaType.title: {!$Label.InvocableActionCreateExternalClientApp.inputEcaTypeLabel}
ecaType.einstein:description: The type of external client app to be created.

ecaName.title: {!$Label.InvocableActionCreateExternalClientApp.inputEcaNameLabel}
ecaName.einstein:description: The name of the external client app to be created. The name can only contain alphanumeric characters, spaces and underscores, not including hyphens. It must be unique, begin with a letter, not end with an underscore, and not contain two consecutive underscores. The name must match the regex pattern ^[a-zA-Z](?!.*__)[\s\w]*[a-zA-Z0-9]$

contactEmail.title: {!$Label.InvocableActionCreateExternalClientApp.inputContactEmailLabel}
contactEmail.einstein:description: The contact email for Salesforce to use to contact the owner of the external client app. Must be a valid email address.

oauthCallbackUrl.title: {!$Label.InvocableActionCreateExternalClientApp.inputOauthCallbackUrlLabel}
oauthCallbackUrl.einstein:description: The URL where users are redirected after successful authentication. Must be a complete HTTPS URL. Multiple URLs can be entered, separated by commas.
